description: As of Monday afternoon, the Atlanta-based airline has canceled more than 800 flights and delayed roughly 1400 flights, according to FlightAware.
title: Delta cancels hundreds of flights as it struggles to recover after Crowdstrike failures

description: There have been protests and murder charges lodged against fired deputy sheriff who fatally shot an Illinois woman who had called 911 for help. A video tape of the shooting was released Monday.
title: Body cam footage released of deputy fatally shooting Illinois woman

description: A Belizean bat scientist is looking to these fuzzy, flying mammals to act as emissaries to galvanize the people of Belize to protect their forests.
title: A scientist in Belize hopes bats can galvanize locals to protect their forests

description: When French President Emmanuel Macron called snap legislative elections in June, he shocked even some of the closest members of his cabinet. Extremes dominate parliament.
title: France’s snap elections made the far-left and the far-right stronger than ever

description: People too dehydrated to take fluids orally need IVs. But unhoused people often avoid emergency rooms. A Phoenix non-profit is now offering IV rehydration on the streets.
title: A Phoenix group is offering IV rehydration for unhoused people who get too dehydrated

description: Member station reporters asked Democratic and Independent voters how they felt about Biden's decision to end his campaign and Kamala Harris being the likely candidate to lead the Democratic ticket.
title: Democratic and Independent voters in swing states weigh in on Biden stepping aside

description: The director of the Secret Service testified before Congress. Kimberly Cheatle faced House lawmakers demanding answers about the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump nine days ago.
title: The head of the Secret Service hears from angry lawmakers on Capitol Hill

description: When Americans vote in a primary, they’re technically voting for delegates to support the candidate the voter chose. Then those delegates are sent to their party’s convention to vote.
title: Can Biden delegates votes for Harris?

description: The Paris Olympics kick off this week. NPR's Becky Sullivan and Brian Mann preview the U.S. athletes and sports to watch, and share why this year's opening ceremony will be different than ever before.
title: The Paris Olympics have almost arrived. Here's what to watch for

description: With the announcement that President Biden would no longer run for the Democratic nomination, and his endorsement of Vice President Harris, the focus is on who Harris might choose as her running mate.
title: As Harris launches her presidential run, the veepstakes is on. Here's who to watch

description: Hunter Biden dropped the lawsuit he had brought against Fox News citing New York state's "revenge porn" statutes. One day later, a district judge dismissed a disinformation expert's defamation suit against Fox.
title: Hunter Biden drops lawsuit against Fox, while network scores separate court victory

description: Ohio Sen. JD Vance used an address at his hometown high school to share his plans for America if elected Vice President alongside Donald Trump.
title: JD Vance vows to fight for ‘forgotten communities’ in hometown rally

description: Trump donated a total of $6,000 to support Harris' bid for reelection as attorney general of California in 2014. Years later, Harris' team said she had given that money to a human rights nonprofit.
title: Donald Trump has donated to Kamala Harris twice, but she didn't keep the money

description: NPR's Michel Martin asks Rep. Jamie Raskin what comes next for Democrats after President Biden's withdrawal from the presidential race, and his endorsement of Kamala Harris for the nomination.
title: Great leaders make space for other great leaders, Rep. Raskin says of Biden

description: President Biden has ended his bid for reelection and has officially endorsed Vice President Harris, who says she plans to win the nomination. Republicans are preparing their campaign against her.
title: Biden drops out of the 2024 race and endorses Harris. What's next for Democrats?

description: NPR's A Martine talks to political analyst and pollster Frank Luntz about how President Biden ending his reelection campaign and endorsing Kamala Harris for the nomination changes the race.
title: How will Biden’s decision change the Republican Party’s plans for November?

description: Sen. Peter Welch of Vermont became a leader in the chorus of others expressing skepticism about President Biden’s ability to campaign, to win and serve four more years.
title: Sen. Welch called for Biden to step aside, but says it was still a shock when he did

description: Pogačar also won the sport’s other major race, the Giro D’Italia, earlier this year, making him the first man to win both majors in a season since 1998.
title: Slovenia's Tadej Pogačar outraced his top rivals to win the Tour de France

description: A researcher for Amnesty International says France's hijab ban causes systemic issues beyond the Olympic games.
title: French Olympians can’t wear hijabs. Human rights group says its discrimination

description: President Biden is passing the torch to Vice President Harris, which changes the narrative of the race against former President Donald Trump.
title: 6 political takeaways from Biden's decision to step aside

description: Drugmaker GSK stopped making asthma inhaler Flovent earlier this year. That’s left patients struggling to find other medication their insurance will cover.Children have been hit especially hard.
title: A discontinued asthma medication has patients scrambling, some to the ER

description: In 2021, Russia sent 335 athletes to the Tokyo Summer Olympics. This year? The number of competitors is just 15. Doping scandals and the Ukraine war have taken a toll on the Olympic powerhouse.
title: Facing scandal and condemnation, Russia fields tiny Olympic team in Paris

description: As a candidate, Kamala Harris likely would take an aggressive stance in support of abortion access — hitting former President Donald Trump on an issue where Republicans have been vulnerable.
title: Harris, who is Biden's voice on abortion rights, is likely to raise the volume

description: Watching a movie is all about kicking back in a comfy chair with a bucket of popcorn and letting the story unfold. But that might change thanks to virtual reality.
title: This could be the way we watch movies in the future

description: Shalom Auslander grew up in a strict Orthodox Jewish home. When he was 7, his grandmother offered him something small that made him rethink his entire relationship to religion.
title: When he was 7, a tiny gesture from his grandmother changed his relationship to God

description: President Biden ends his reelection bid and endorses VP Harris as his choice to take over the top of the Democratic ticket. The GOP aims to tie Harris to Biden’s biggest troubles, including inflation.
title: Morning news brief

description: While Vice President Harris has yet to secure the Democratic Party’s nomination, Republicans are already trying to tie her to President Biden’s biggest troubles, including immigration and inflation.
title: GOP takes aim at Harris-- even though she doesn't have the nomination yet

description: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle is set to testify before the House Oversight Committee Monday on the security failures that preceded the shooting of former President Donald Trump.
title: The first congressional hearing into the Trump assassination attempt begins shortly

description: U.S. authorities arrested a 72-year-old Syrian man at the Los Angeles airport -- in a case that activists hope will be a turning point for victims of Syria's ruling regime.
title: U.S. authorities arrest an ex-Syrian military official who ran a notorious prison

description: With Biden out of the race, NPR's Michel Martin asks former Democratic National Committee chair Howard Dean what Democrats need to achieve before their nominating convention next month.
title: With the convention nearing, Democrats need a new ticket to confront Trump

description: Minnesota's uncommitted delegates to the DNC represent voters who protested President Biden's handling of the war in Gaza. Now that he's dropped out of the race, they are considering their next steps.
title: Will the Democrat's uncommitted delegates support Kamala Harris?

description: Vice President Harris is already the target of disinformation online. NPR's Michel Martin asks Nina Jankowicz of the American Sunlight Project what's ahead if Harris tops the ticket.
title: For much of Kamala Harris' political career she's been the target of online trolls

description: Tadej Pogacar of Slovenia clinched victory Sunday at this year's Tour de France. A rapid 21-mile final time trial kept him ahead of his two chief Danish and Belgian rivals
title: Tadej Pogacar wins the Tour de France -- his third title

description: It's unclear how the Democratic Party will move ahead now that its standard-bearer, President Biden, is stepping away from the 2024 ticket. He endorsed Vice President Harris to take over.
title: Harris takes over the top of the Democratic ticket after Biden drops out

description: NPR's Michel Martin speaks to Sean Cooksey, chairman of the Federal Election Commission, about what can happen with President Biden's campaign funds, now that he has dropped out.
title: Biden dropped his reelection plans. What happens to his campaign war chest?

description: A play about witches is selling out in Ukraine's capital Kyiv. And even though the plot takes place centuries ago, the play's takeaways and parallels to today resonate with Ukrainians. We hear from actors and audience members.
title: A Story About Witches in Ukraine

description: Many tech entrepreneurs have long suggested that guaranteed income could cushion job losses from AI and automation. The latest and largest study of the idea was spearheaded by the man behind ChatGPT.
title: As new tech threatens jobs, Silicon Valley promotes no-strings cash aid

description: The announcement comes in the wake of the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump last Saturday.
title: Mayorkas names panel to conduct review of Trump assassination attempt
